entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
